spaceflight_production.name: Spaceflight Production
spaceflight_production.description: Buildings for spaceship component manufacturing and magical material processing

shipyard.name: Shipyard & Research
shipyard.description: Ship construction facilities and β-space research infrastructure

automation.name: Factory Automation
automation.description: Industrial automation and Dyson Swarm construction

governance.name: Governance & Information
governance.description: Administrative buildings providing population and resource tracking

religious.name: Religious Infrastructure
religious.description: Sacred sites for worship, prayer, and belief generation

maternal_care.name: Maternal Health
maternal_care.description: Pregnancy, labor, and infant care facilities

buildings.name: Arcane Forge
buildings.description: A forge infused with magical energies for processing mana crystals, stellarite, and other magical materials. Essential for spaceflight component production.

buildings.name: Ley Line Extractor
buildings.description: A specialized facility that taps into ley lines to extract and process void essence and concentrated mana. Must be built near a ley line node for maximum efficiency.

buildings.name: Electronics Laboratory
buildings.description: A high-tech facility for fabricating circuits, processors, and neural interfaces. Clean room conditions maintained by magical air filtration.

buildings.name: Spaceship Shipyard
buildings.description: A standard shipyard for assembling ship components. Can produce hull plating, propulsion systems, and basic ship modules.

buildings.name: Advanced Spaceship Shipyard
buildings.description: A state-of-the-art shipyard capable of assembling complex β-space capable vessels. Integrates arcane components for emotional navigation systems.

buildings.name: Temporal Research Laboratory
buildings.description: A heavily shielded facility for manipulating temporal mechanics. Required for processing temporal crystals and building time-manipulation devices.

buildings.name: Reality Forge
buildings.description: The pinnacle of combined magical and technological achievement. A facility capable of manipulating the fundamental fabric of reality itself.

buildings.name: Mana Condenser
buildings.description: A tower that draws ambient mana from the atmosphere. Passively generates mana shards over time. More effective when placed on ley line nodes.

buildings.name: Void Well
buildings.description: A dangerous extraction facility that opens tiny rifts to the void. Produces void essence but requires careful management to prevent catastrophic breaches.

buildings.name: Emotional Resonance Chamber
buildings.description: A chamber where agents can contribute their emotional experiences to be crystallized into emotional resonance. A key ingredient for β-space navigation technology.

buildings.name: Soul Collection Shrine
buildings.description: A sacred shrine where soul fragments naturally accumulate from the departed. Requires proper funerary rites to function and is the only ethical source of soul fragments.

buildings.name: Stellarite Smelter
buildings.description: A specialized high-temperature smelter for processing stellarite ore. Uses magical containment fields to handle the extreme temperatures required.

buildings.name: Basic Shipyard
buildings.description: A basic shipyard for constructing physical propulsion spacecraft. Enables worldship and basic vessel construction.

buildings.name: Worldship Drydock
buildings.description: A massive drydock facility for constructing generation ships capable of sustaining communities across interstellar distances.

buildings.name: Advanced Shipyard
buildings.description: An upgraded shipyard capable of constructing β-space capable vessels. Integrates mana-infused materials for emotional navigation systems.

buildings.name: VR Training Chamber
buildings.description: A curated emotional experience space for training crews in β-space navigation. Uses advanced illusion magic for full sensory immersion.

buildings.name: Meditation Training Hall
buildings.description: A serene space for emotional regulation training. Crews must master emotional control before β-space navigation.

buildings.name: Medical Research Lab
buildings.description: A laboratory for neural interface research and brainship symbiosis development. Required for integrating consciousness with ship systems.

buildings.name: VR Research Laboratory
buildings.description: An advanced laboratory for developing emotion theater systems and immersive emotional induction technology.

buildings.name: Digital Fabrication Lab
buildings.description: A high-tech facility for constructing Gleisner vessels where consciousness and hull are unified.

buildings.name: Temporal Research Laboratory
buildings.description: A facility for studying temporal mechanics and developing Svetz retrieval technology for temporal archaeology.

buildings.name: Quantum Research Laboratory
buildings.description: A facility for quantum mechanics research and probability scout development. Enables mapping unobserved probability branches.

buildings.name: Reality Engineering Laboratory
buildings.description: The ultimate research facility for developing timeline merger technology. Capable of collapsing compatible probability branches.

buildings.name: Solar Panel
buildings.description: Converts sunlight into electrical power. Foundation of factory energy.

buildings.name: Solar Array
buildings.description: Large array of solar panels for higher energy output.

buildings.name: Battery Bank
buildings.description: Stores excess power for use during low generation periods.

buildings.name: Fusion Reactor
buildings.description: High-capacity power generation for massive factory cities.

buildings.name: Conveyor Belt
buildings.description: Moves items between machines automatically.

buildings.name: Fast Belt
buildings.description: Higher throughput conveyor belt.

buildings.name: Express Belt
buildings.description: Maximum speed belt for high-throughput factories.

buildings.name: Inserter
buildings.description: Transfers items between belts and machines.

buildings.name: Fast Inserter
buildings.description: Higher speed item transfer.

buildings.name: Assembly Machine I
buildings.description: Basic automated crafting machine.

buildings.name: Assembly Machine II
buildings.description: Improved assembly machine with faster crafting.

buildings.name: Assembly Machine III
buildings.description: Advanced assembly machine for high-tier production.

buildings.name: Chemical Plant
buildings.description: Processes chemicals and fluids.

buildings.name: Factory AI Core
buildings.description: Autonomous AI that manages factory production, detects bottlenecks, and optimizes efficiency.

buildings.name: Roboport
buildings.description: Command center for construction and logistics robots.

buildings.name: Solar Sail Assembler
buildings.description: Specialized factory for constructing solar sails for Dyson Swarm.

buildings.name: Dyson Receiver Station
buildings.description: Receives power transmitted from Dyson Swarm.

buildings.name: Dyson Control Station
buildings.description: Controls and coordinates Dyson Swarm operations.

buildings.name: Town Hall
buildings.description: Basic governance building. Tracks population count, agent roster, births, and deaths

buildings.name: Census Bureau
buildings.description: Demographics and analytics. Tracks age distribution, birth/death rates, and population projections. Requires Town Hall. Must be staffed

buildings.name: Granary / Resource Warehouse
buildings.description: Resource tracking. Shows stockpiles, production/consumption rates, and days until depletion

buildings.name: Weather Station
buildings.description: Environmental monitoring. Provides temperature forecasts and extreme weather warnings. Must be placed in open area

buildings.name: Health Clinic
buildings.description: Medical tracking. Monitors population health, diseases, malnutrition, and causes of death. Must be staffed by healers

buildings.name: Meeting Hall
buildings.description: Social cohesion tracking. Maps social networks, tracks relationships, detects conflicts, and monitors morale

buildings.name: Watchtower
buildings.description: Threat detection. Provides early warning of environmental threats and resource crises. Must be staffed by watchman

buildings.name: Labor Guild
buildings.description: Workforce management. Tracks labor allocation, skill inventory, and identifies bottlenecks. Requires Town Hall

buildings.name: Archive / Library
buildings.description: Historical data and analysis. Provides long-term trend analysis, generational comparisons, and predictive modeling. Requires Census Bureau and Town Hall. Must be staffed by scholar

buildings.name: Shrine
buildings.description: Small sacred site. Believers can pray here. Generates modest belief for deities. Marks the start of organized faith

buildings.name: Temple
buildings.description: Formal place of worship. Significantly boosts belief generation. Can host rituals and ceremonies. Allows priest designation

buildings.name: Grand Temple
buildings.description: Magnificent house of worship. Massive belief generation. Center of religious life. Allows multiple priests and grand ceremonies. Becomes a pilgrimage destination

buildings.name: Meditation Garden
buildings.description: Peaceful outdoor sanctuary. Increases vision clarity and meditation effectiveness. Believers find peace and clarity here

buildings.name: Sacred Grove
buildings.description: Ancient trees dedicated to nature deities. Natural sacred site. Especially powerful for nature, harvest, and earth deities

buildings.name: General Store
buildings.description: A general store that buys and sells common goods and supplies

buildings.name: Blacksmith Shop
buildings.description: A blacksmith shop specializing in metal tools, weapons, and armor

buildings.name: Farm Supply Shop
buildings.description: A shop specializing in seeds, farming tools, and agricultural supplies

buildings.name: Tavern
buildings.description: A cozy tavern selling food, drinks, and providing a place for social gatherings

buildings.name: Birthing Hut
buildings.description: A dedicated space for labor and delivery. Provides safety bonuses during birth, reduces complication severity, and offers privacy for mothers. Must be staffed by a midwife for full benefits.

buildings.name: Nursery
buildings.description: A warm, safe space for infants and nursing mothers. Improves infant health, supports wet nursing, and provides a gathering place for new mothers. Requires Birthing Hut.

buildings.name: Maternity Clinic
buildings.description: Advanced maternal care facility with prenatal checkup capabilities. Provides early detection of pregnancy complications and improves birth outcomes. Requires Health Clinic and Birthing Hut. Must be staffed by skilled midwife.
